ExportDifferential.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT @@ EXPORT_FIELDS @@ FROM w2_DmShippingHistory WHERE w2_DmShippingHistory.date_changed >= @date_changed ORDER BY w2_DmShippingHistory.user_id, w2_DmShippingHistory.dm_code ASC

ExportAll.Statement:
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED;
SELECT @@ EXPORT_FIELDS @@ FROM w2_DmShippingHistory ORDER BY w2_DmShippingHistory.user_id, w2_DmShippingHistory.dm_code ASC
